definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Radiant energy is also called light energy.
In radiation, thermal energy is transformed into radiant energy ,similar in nature to light.
sentences.chinese: 熱能在輻射時，轉換成性質與光相似的輻射能。

sentences.english: All radiant energy has wavelike characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 所有的輻射能都具有波的特徵。

sentences.english: The Curies believed that there was something in nature which gave out radiation.
sentences.chinese: 居里夫婦認爲自然界必存在某種物質能釋放輻射能。

sentences.english: In radiation, thermal energy is transformed into radiant energy , similar in nature to light.
sentences.chinese: 熱能在輻射時，轉換成性質與光類似的輻射能。

sentences.english: Solar energy is radiant energy that is produced by the sun.
sentences.chinese: 所謂太陽能，就是太陽產生的輻射能。
